info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 2 at 1:04PM CDT until April 6 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee...
Obion River near Bogota
For the Obion River...including Bogota...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Obion River near Bogota.
* WHEN...From late Thursday night to Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Widespread lowland and agricultural flooding is occurring. Water is reaching the outskirts of Bogota.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Friday morning to 22.5 feet Friday evening. Pay close attention to subsequent forecasts as multiple days of rain will impact the crest and duration of the flooding. The river will likely remain elevated through at least the weekend. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY MORNING
